subject: Coaches and Managers
Basketball (College)
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Tarkanian, one of college basketball’s most successful coaches in his 19 seasons at Nevada-Las Vegas, had a long-running feud with the N.C.A.A.
snippet: Tarkanian, one of college basketball’s most successful coaches in his 19 seasons at Nevada-Las Vegas, had a long-running feud with the N.C.A.A.
